name: Nero BackItUp Archive
summary: An NBA file is a compressed archive created by Nero BackItUp, a file backup utility. It contains one or more files that a user backed up. Users typically store NBA files on USB flash drives, external hard drives, or other backup media.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .nba to .zip , then expand with Zip-decompression tool
